item.name: Delete
01 - Return no content status when delete company by id
02 - Return bad request status when delete company by invalid id
03 - Return not found status when delete by not found company id
04 - Return not found status when delete by company id already deleted
Get all by name or email paginated
01 - Return ok status when get companies by name or email
02 - Return ok status and empty result when get customers by name or email and companies do not exists
02 - Products
Create
01 - Return created status when create new product
02 - Return bad request status when product skw was not filled
03 - Return bad request status when product sku length is bigger than 20 characters
04 - Return conflict status when product sku already exists
05 - Return bad request status when product description was not filled
06 - Return bad request status when product description length is invalid
07 - Return bad request status when product unit measurement was not filled
08 - Return bad request status when product unit measurement length is invalid
09 - Return bad request status when product quantity stock is lower than zero
10 - Return bad request status when product price is lower than zero Copy
Get
01 - Return ok when find product by id
02 - Return not found when not find product by id
03 - Return bad request when not find product by invalid id
Update
01 - Return accepted status when update product
02 - Return bad request status when update product without sku
03 - Return bad request status when update product sku length is invalid
04 - Return conflict status when update product sku already exists in other product
05 - Return bad request status when update product description was not filled
06 - Return bad request status when update product description length is invalid
07 - Return bad request status when update product unit measurement was not filled
08 - Return bad request status when update product unit measurement length is invalid
09 - Return bad request status when update product quantity stock is lower than zero
10 - Return bad request status when update product price is lower than zero Copy
Delete
01 - Return no content status when delete product
02 - Return bad request status when delete product by invalid id
03 - Return not found status when delete product by not found id
Get all by sku or description
01 - Return ok status when get product by sku or description
02 - Return ok status and empty result when get product by sku or description and it does not exist
Batch
01 - Return created http status when products was imported
03 - Order
Create
01 - Return created http status when an order was created
02 - Return bad request http status when company id was not filled
03 - Return bad request http status when an order customer id was not filled
04 - Return bad request http status when an order items was not filled
05 - Return bad request http status when an order items product id was not filled
06 - Return bad request http status when an order items quantity is invalid
07 - Return bad request http status when an order items price is invalid
Get
01 - Return ok when find order by id
Update
01 - Return ok when update order
Payment
01 - Return no content http status when an order was paid
